title: EMT order list schema for AMTweaker

___name.description: Display name for the order. Can be a translation tag defined as a resource (realm assts.economical.lang)

___biome.description: Order biome category. none (default), plane, cold, arid, damp or hell.

___request.description: Requested item. Either an ore dictionary tag or an item in the form modid:item:damage

___amount.description: Amount of items necessary to fulfill the order.

___reward.description: MP reward for fulfilling the order.

___season.description: Order season. none (default), spring, summer, autumn or winter.
